page.title: 06RHOSSILLI
page.content: I am Nicky. It is November 1st 1985. I live in{Rhossilli,}a rural village on the{Gower peninsula.}My father is a farmer and sometimes I help him on the farm. The place in which I live is very nice as it is a mixture between country and beach land. My father owns a Ford Escort car and every Tuesday my mother drives 20 miles to town to get the food for the following week. Last night, October 31st, I went to a Halloweeen party. Halloween celebrates {All Hallows Eve}when all the witches and ghosts are supposed to come out and spook all the humans that are out. I went out to a party where I was ducking apples and eating hot dogs. Some people complain that there isn't much to do in our area but although it's fairly quiet I enjoy the peace and beauty of the landscape. NICKY TUCKER 2S
